backupWarning.title: Important Warning
backupWarning.message: Always backup your original save file before making any modifications!

quickActions.greatShardDesc: Great bone shard pack (adds 200 bone fragments)
quickActions.toolMetalDesc: Metal material for crafting tools and equipment
quickActions.uploadFileFirst: Please upload a save file first to enable editing

upload.title: Upload Silksong Save File
upload.description: Click here or drag and drop your .dat file to start editing
upload.dropHere: Release to upload your save file
upload.processing: Decoding and parsing your save data...
upload.error: Failed to load save file. Please check the file format.

download.error: Failed to generate save file. Please check your modifications.

editor.placeholder: Upload a save file to start editing...
editor.invalid: Invalid JSON - please fix syntax errors before downloading

locations.title: Save File Locations
locations.note: Note: Replace {SteamID} with your actual Steam ID number

usage.title: How to Use
usage.step1: 1. Locate your save file using the paths above
usage.step2: 2. Upload the dat file using the upload button
usage.step3: 3. Edit the JSON data in the Monaco editor

tips.title: Tips & Warnings
tips.backup: Always backup your original save file before making changes
tips.test: Test modifications on a copy first
tips.syntax: Ensure JSON syntax is valid before downloading
tips.exitGame: Completely exit the game before replacing the save file
